actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

official_title: To require the Secretary of Transportation to issue regulations addressing safety concerns in minimizing delay for automobile traffic at railroad grade crossings.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to issue regulations to address safety concerns and to minimize delay for automobile traffic on our Nation's roads with respect to trains blocking traffic at railroad grade crossings.

titles.title: To require the Secretary of Transportation to issue regulations addressing safety concerns in minimizing delay for automobile traffic at railroad grade crossings.
